job_summary: Responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and backend services. Architect secure and efficient PostgreSQL database schemas and manage complex data models. Develop custom modules and integrate third-party APIs using Node.js. Write clean, reusable, and testable code; contribute to deployment and migration strategies. Optimize performance, implement security best practices, and monitor production systems. Requirements: 5+ years of backend development experience. Proficiency in Node.js, PostgreSQL, and RESTful API design. Knowledge of PHP-based systems and legacy migration (preferred). Strong understanding of security, caching, rate limiting, logging, and database optimization. Experience with containerization and cloud platforms is an advantage. What We Offer Start fully remote, with relocation to onsite in Riyadh after the initial period Work on high-impact projects in government and enterprise sectors Be part of collaborative cross-functional teams across design, engineering, and product Thrive in a culture of innovation using AI-assisted engineering tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Replit, Cursor) Show more Show less
job_industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Business Consulting and Services, and Outsourcing and Offshoring Consulting

job_poster.name: Aditya Nair
job_poster.title: Technical Recruitment Consultant at SmartChoice International for UK & Europe || "Seeing yourself confident in mirror is tougher than getting famousâ€¦

job_description_formatted:
Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and backend services.
  • Architect secure and efficient PostgreSQL database schemas and manage complex data models.
  • Develop custom modules and integrate third-party APIs using Node.js.
  • Write clean, reusable, and testable code; contribute to deployment and migration strategies.
  • Optimize performance, implement security best practices, and monitor production systems.


Requirements:

  • 5+ years of backend development experience.
  • Proficiency in Node.js, PostgreSQL, and RESTful API design.
  • Knowledge of PHP-based systems and legacy migration (preferred).
  • Strong understanding of security, caching, rate limiting, logging, and database optimization.
  • Experience with containerization and cloud platforms is an advantage.


What We Offer

  • Start fully remote, with relocation to onsite in Riyadh after the initial period
  • Work on high-impact projects in government and enterprise sectors
  • Be part of collaborative cross-functional teams across design, engineering, and product
  • Thrive in a culture of innovation using AI-assisted engineering tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Replit, Cursor)
